200.html:
data [required]

[object]

List of tag policies.

attributes [required]

object

Attributes of a tag policy response.

created_at [required]

date-time

Timestamp when the policy was created.

created_by [required]

string

User who created the policy.

enabled [required]

boolean

Whether the policy is enabled.

modified_at [required]

date-time

Timestamp when the policy was last modified.

modified_by [required]

string

User who last modified the policy.

negated [required]

boolean

Whether the policy is negated.

policy_name [required]

string

The name of the tag policy.

required [required]

boolean

Whether the tag is required.

scope [required]

string

The scope of the tag policy.

source [required]

string

The data source for the tag policy (e.g., logs, metrics).

tag_key [required]

string

The tag key that the policy applies to.

tag_value_patterns [required]

[string]

List of patterns that tag values must match.

version [required]

int64

The version of the tag policy.

id [required]

string

The unique identifier of the tag policy.

type [required]

enum

The type of the resource. The value should always be tag_policy. Allowed enum values: tag_policy

400.html:
errors [required]

[object]

A list of errors.

detail

string

A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the error.

meta

object

Non-standard meta-information about the error

source

object

References to the source of the error.

header

string

A string indicating the name of a single request header which caused the error.

parameter

string

A string indicating which URI query parameter caused the error.

pointer

string

A JSON pointer to the value in the request document that caused the error.

status

string

Status code of the response.

title

string

Short human-readable summary of the error.

request.html:
data [required]

object

Data envelope for tag policy update request.

attributes [required]

object

Attributes for updating a tag policy. All fields are optional.

enabled

boolean

Whether the policy is enabled.

negated

boolean

Whether the policy is negated.

policy_name

string

The name of the tag policy.

required

boolean

Whether the tag is required.

scope

string

The scope of the tag policy.

source

string

The data source for the tag policy (e.g., logs, metrics).

tag_key

string

The tag key that the policy applies to.

tag_value_patterns

[string]

List of patterns that tag values must match.

type [required]

enum

The type of the resource. The value should always be tag_policy. Allowed enum values: tag_policy

200.html:
data [required]

object

Data envelope for tag policy score response.

attributes [required]

object

Attributes of a tag policy score.

score [required]

double

The compliance score for the tag policy.

ts_end [required]

int64

End timestamp for the score calculation period.

ts_start [required]

int64

Start timestamp for the score calculation period.

version

int64

The version of the score.

id [required]

string

The unique identifier of the score.

type [required]

enum

The type of the resource. The value should always be tag_policy_score. Allowed enum values: tag_policy_score
